workflow.name: CSE Threat Detected Events to Incidents, Email, Isolate
workflow.title: CSE Threat Detected Events to Incidents, Email, Isolate

properties.name: SecureX Environment URL
properties.description: Placeholder for the URL of the SecureX environment being used. You don't need to provide this, it will be fetched automatically

properties.name: Secure Endpoint Environment URL
properties.description: Placeholder for the URL of the Secure Endpoint environment being used. You don't need to provide this, it will be fetched automatically

This workflow periodically checks Cisco Secure Endpoint for Threat Detected events. When an event is returned, the workflow collects information from it and creates a casebook and incident in Cisco SecureX to document what happened. This workflow is designed to run every 5 minutes on a schedule.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: AMP_Target, CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target

Steps:
[] Detect the region/environment being used
[] Calculate date/times
[] Fetch events from Secure Endpoint
[] Check if events were returned, if not end the workflow
[] For each event:
[]> Extract the event's information
[]> Format the information for Threat Response
[]> Create an incident, casebook, and sighting

More information: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0026

input.variable_workflow_01PP74DHJ95XG4OD0Oerb0: Endpoint related to a Threat Detected event

properties.body:
A Threat was detected for Secure Endpoint host $activity.definition_activity_01U70KV6WQNV42b555heLGOoFyQHEpzQeIi.output.jsonpath_queries.hostname$ and is Isolated for further Investigation

An Incident Ticket as well as associated Casebook is created and can be accessed on SecureX


Summary of the Event:
* Incident ID: https://visibility.amp.cisco.com/incidents?q=id:$activity.definition_activity_01U70KVIC1XY13fjrxZDRgSGBp7uadgKDfa.output.variable_workflow_01PP773PC1CVM3SzJJrvuZfEsO3Nbw7IO7S$
* Casebook ID: $activity.definition_activity_01U70KVKQMUKJ4Z2eXDsZjv7aJTZ1iDa7kn.output.variable_workflow_01PP75X6NLWYO1BiZbBFEXJyqmmfiQcqId3$

* Event Severity: $activity.definition_activity_01U70KV3EC5SK79TcRnzM7RlwpFJmXLSEnP.input.source_array[@].severity$
* Detection: $activity.definition_activity_01U70KV3EC5SK79TcRnzM7RlwpFJmXLSEnP.input.source_array[@].detection$
* File: $activity.definition_activity_01U70KV8F0SXU3lUKYCe7OwHTkOSm1hjgqN.output.jsonpath_queries.file_name$ ($activity.definition_activity_01U70KV8F0SXU3lUKYCe7OwHTkOSm1hjgqN.output.jsonpath_queries.disposition$)
* SHA256: $activity.definition_activity_01U70KV8F0SXU3lUKYCe7OwHTkOSm1hjgqN.output.jsonpath_queries.file_hash$
* Date: $activity.definition_activity_01U70KV3EC5SK79TcRnzM7RlwpFJmXLSEnP.input.source_array[@].date$



Happy Hunting!!
Regards,
NETX SOC
